department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Lead Paint Abatement for Mactaquac Biodiversity Facility
description: Abatement of hazard lead with encapsulation
full_summary:
=================================
### Invitation to Tender

#### Lead Paint Abatement - Mactaquac, New Brunswick, Canada

#### Solicitation Number
WS4521239748

#### Tender Reference
WS4521239748-Doc4553784140

#### Amendment History
This tender is subject to amendment. Please note Amendment Number 4, dated 2024-05-14.

#### Closing Date
The tender closing date is 2024-05-16T14:00:00.

#### Category
*Construction Services and Buildings*

#### Tender Description
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is seeking proposals for Lead Paint Abatement at the Biodiversity Facility in Mactaquac, New Brunswick, Canada.

#### Selection Criteria
The selection of the successful proponent will be based solely on their price, using the Lowest Price method.

#### Evaluation Criteria
The tender will be evaluated on the following criteria:
* Hazardous waste disposal
* Lead based paint abatement or encapsulation
* General business capabilities

#### Geographic Region
The successful proponent must fulfill all contract-obligations within the New Brunswick region of Canada.

#### Notice Type
This is an Invitation to Qualify tendering process.

#### Contracting Authority
The contracting authority is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) GD Ltd.

#### Project Manager
For more information, please contact:
Timothee Beausoleil2, SPAC/PWGS
timothy.beausoleil2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### Languages
English and French are the official languages of Canada.

#### Related Documents
There are no attachments to this notice.

#### Request for Proposal
